import React, {useState} from 'react' const AddResaurant = () => { const [name, setName] = useState(""); const [location, setLocation] = useState(""); const [priceRange, setPriceRange] = useState("Price Range"); const handleSubmit = (e) => { } return (
setName(e.target.value)} type="text" className="form-control" placeholder="name">
setLocation(e.target.value)} type="text" className="form-control" placeholder="location">
) } export default AddResaurant
